name: Word Search (itch) (Jono)
description:
Word Search is a no-nonsense word search game. Each game chooses a random assortment of words from categories for you to play - so no play-through is the same. Over 280 words in total!

  • Three game sizes:
    • Small (4 words)
    • Medium (8 words)
    • Large (12 words)
  • Four categories:
    • Mammals
    • Instruments
    • Professions
    • Colors
  • Simple mouse-only controls:
    • Left-click/drag to select words, right-click/drag to deselect them
